statements: SELECT * FROM UserPermissions WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, permission_level FROM UserPermissions WHERE permission_level = 'admin';
SELECT user_id, access_control_list FROM UserPermissions WHERE user_id BETWEEN 1 AND 5;
SELECT DISTINCT permission_level FROM UserPermissions;
SELECT user_id, permission_level FROM UserPermissions ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM UserPermissions WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, permission_level FROM UserPermissions WHERE permission_level = 'admin';
SELECT user_id, permission_level, access_control_list FROM UserPermissions WHERE user_id = 2 AND permission_level = 'user';
SELECT permission_level, access_control_list FROM UserPermissions WHERE user_id = 3 ORDER BY permission_level ASC;
SELECT * FROM UserPermissions WHERE permission_level = 'admin' OR permission_level = 'user' ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_permissions;
SELECT user_id, permission_level FROM user_permissions WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, permission_level FROM user_permissions ORDER BY permission_level DESC;
SELECT acl_id, user_id, resource_id, access_level FROM access_control_lists WHERE acl_id = 10;
SELECT acl_id, user_id, resource_id, access_level FROM access_control_lists WHERE access_level = 'write';
SELECT user_id, permission_level FROM user_permissions
SELECT permission_level, user_id FROM user_permissions
SELECT * FROM access_control_lists WHERE resource_id = 1
SELECT user_id, access_level FROM access_control_lists WHERE access_level = 'read'
SELECT acl_id, user_id, resource_id FROM access_control_lists ORDER BY acl_id DESC
SELECT * FROM users_permissions;
SELECT user_id, permission_id FROM users_permissions WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, access_level FROM access_control_lists ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT username FROM user_authentication WHERE user_id = 2;
SELECT user_id, permission_id, access_level FROM users_permissions JOIN access_control_lists ON users_permissions.user_id = access_control_lists.user_id;
SELECT * FROM users_permissions JOIN access_control_lists ON users_permissions.user_id = access_control_lists.user_id;
SELECT users_permissions.user_id, access_control_lists.access_level FROM users_permissions, access_control_lists WHERE users_permissions.user_id = access_control_lists.user_id;
SELECT * FROM users_permissions LEFT JOIN access_control_lists ON users_permissions.user_id = access_control_lists.user_id;
SELECT user_id, username FROM user_authentication WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM users_permissions ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_roles;
SELECT role_id, role_name FROM roles ORDER BY role_name ASC;
SELECT permission_name FROM permissions WHERE permission_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, role_id FROM user_roles WHERE user_id = 10;
SELECT user_id, permission_id FROM user_permissions WHERE user_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM user_roles JOIN roles ON user_roles.role_id = roles.role_id;
SELECT user_id, role_name FROM user_roles JOIN roles ON user_roles.role_id = roles.role_id WHERE user_id = 1;

SELECT user_id, role_name, permission_name FROM user_roles JOIN roles ON user_roles.role_id = roles.role_id JOIN user_permissions ON user_roles.user_id = user_permissions.user_id JOIN permissions ON user_permissions.permission_id = permissions.permission_id;
SELECT role_name, COUNT(user_id) AS user_count FROM user_roles JOIN roles ON user_roles.role_id = roles.role_id GROUP BY role_name;

SELECT user_id, permission_name FROM user_roles JOIN user_permissions ON user_roles.user_id = user_permissions.user_id JOIN permissions ON user_permissions.permission_id = permissions.permission_id WHERE user_id = 2;
SELECT user_id, permission FROM UserPermissions
SELECT acl_id, acl_name FROM AccessControlList
SELECT role_id, role_name FROM UserRoles
SELECT user_id, role_id FROM UserRoleMapping
SELECT role_id, permission_id FROM PermissionMapping
SELECT user_id, permission FROM UserPermissions WHERE permission = 'read';
SELECT acl_id, acl_name FROM AccessControlList ORDER BY acl_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, role_id FROM UserRoleMapping WHERE user_id = 1 AND role_id = 2;
SELECT role_id, permission_id FROM PermissionMapping WHERE permission_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT * FROM UserRoles WHERE role_name LIKE '%admin%' ORDER BY role_id ASC;
